=======
CHANGES
=======

1.2.0 (2009-03-07)
------------------

- Allow use of ``z3c.pt`` using ``z3c.ptcompat`` compatibility later.

- Change package's mailing list address to zope-dev at zope.org.


1.1.0 (2007-11-01)
------------------

- Update package info data.

- Add z3c namespace package declaration.


1.0.0 (2007-09-30)
------------------

- Initial release.
